page.title: 19 Transport - Buses
page.content: The Eastham area is serviced by the Merseyside Passenger Transport Executive and the Crosville National Bus Company.The only bus that goes into the village is the number 85 and there is one school bus service. Bus passes are given to school children and the Elderly,and the M.P.T.E has introduced{Mersey Link,}a mini Bus Service for the disabled who just ring and the bus calls at their home.This is the only service of its kind in the country. A bus drivers life is a busy one. His normal working time consists of a 13 working day fortnight,with one compulsary day off.The weeks are made up of three shifts;earlies,lates and mixed. The bus driver is linked to a main control by a radio system which can be used in emergencies.
